scripts.publish-prerelease: npm run build && npm -no-git-tag-version version prerelease && npm run commit-local && npm run push-tag && npm publish --tag next
scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && npm run test && npm -no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run commit-local && npm run push-tag && npm publish
scripts.publish-patch-local: npm run build && npm run test && npm -no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run commit-local && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && npm run test && npm -no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run commit-local && npm run push-tag && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: npm run build && npm run test && npm -no-git-tag-version version major && npm run commit-local && npm run push-tag && npm publish
scripts.commit-local: git add package.json && git commit -m "Bump version number to $npm_package_version"
scripts.push-tag: git checkout -b auto-git-publish-$npm_package_version && git add -f dist/**/* && git commit -m "Release $npm_package_version" && git tag -a $npm_package_version -m "Release $npm_package_version" && git push upstream $npm_package_version
